name: Almabtrieb (Demo)
description:
A young bookworm named Adelaide falls into the Water Goddess Fountain one day and ends up in a mountain village of nature spirits!  She wakes up to find a living version of the fountain's statue - Undis, who has saved her from drowning.  

To repay her savior, she will try to help save Almabtrieb - a festival celebrating the return of the cattle from the higher pastures down to their barns in the valley for the coming colder months.  As a port town girl who’s never even seen a cow before, Adelaide has a lot to learn!

This is an old demo I made for a past Tyranobuilder game jam - someday I'd like to rework this idea!
